applicationProfileUsageNote.en: It is about coherence that is important to understand the result of individual observations, e.g. biotic relationships (animal A is predator and is present because animal B is prey). Such relationships require to be explicitly described (as opposed to relationships such as the coincidence of results of Observations in space or time that may remain implicit).
